title: CGRevu
author: CGRevu
content: NFL Week 14 Play of the WeekThe 10-2 Minnesota Vikings travel to Detroit to meet the 5-7  Lions. Looking at the records it seems as though this will be an easy victory for the Vikings but that’s not going to be the case. Detroit is 4-1 in their last 5 games with the sole loss coming against Buffalo. Detroit’s playing with a lot of emotion and they will score points. This could be close but the Lions should still cover.Detroit -2https://cryptogamingrevu.com/sports-picks/nfl/
